name: Arduino Uno
description: Microcontroller board based on the ATmega328P, ideal for beginners in IoT and robotics.

name: ESP32
description: Powerful microcontroller with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for IoT applications.

name: Raspberry Pi 4
description: Microprocessor board used for building high-performance IoT and AI projects.

name: DHT11
description: Basic digital temperature and humidity sensor for environmental monitoring.

name: LDR
description: Light-dependent resistor used for detecting light intensity changes.

name: HC-SR04
description: Ultrasonic sensor used for distance measurement in robotics and automation.

name: MQ-2
description: Gas sensor for detecting smoke, methane, and LPG levels.

name: Relay Module
description: Control module for switching high-voltage devices using low-voltage signals.

name: Servo Motor
description: Precision motor used for angular or linear position control in robotics.

name: Stepper Motor
description: Motor used for precise control of rotational steps in automation.

name: OLED Display
description: Compact, energy-efficient display module with high contrast and brightness.

name: 7-Segment Display
description: Display module used to show numerical data in embedded systems.

name: Potentiometer
description: Variable resistor used to control voltage or measure resistance.

name: LED Strip
description: Flexible lighting module for visual effects or indication purposes.

name: Buzzer
description: Audio module used for generating alert sounds in devices.

name: IR Receiver
description: Module used for receiving infrared signals from remote controls.

name: RFID Module
description: Identification module used for reading and writing RFID tags.

name: Bluetooth Module
description: Module for enabling wireless data transfer using Bluetooth technology.

name: Wi-Fi Module
description: Module for connecting IoT devices to wireless networks.

name: GPS Module
description: Module used for obtaining geographical location and time data.

name: Soil Moisture Sensor
description: Sensor for measuring the water content in soil, ideal for agriculture projects.

name: PH Sensor
description: Chemical sensor used for measuring the pH level of liquids.

name: Tilt Sensor
description: Motion sensor used for detecting angular movement or tilt.

name: Flame Sensor
description: Fire detection sensor used for sensing infrared light from flames.

name: Light Bulb
description: Lighting module used in automation or IoT-based smart home projects.

name: Smart Plug
description: Module for controlling power supply to devices remotely.

name: DC Motor
description: Actuator used for driving rotational motion in devices.

name: Sound Sensor
description: Audio sensor used for detecting sound intensity or loudness.

name: MQ-135
description: Air quality sensor used for monitoring harmful gases like CO2.

name: LCD Display
description: Liquid crystal display used for presenting text and data in embedded systems.

name: Push Button
description: Mechanical switch used for user interaction in devices.

name: Temperature Probe
description: Temperature sensor for precise measurement in scientific applications.

name: Pulse Sensor
description: Health monitoring sensor for measuring heartbeat rate.

name: Infrared Emitter
description: Module used for emitting infrared signals in remote control systems.

name: Vibration Motor
description: Actuator that generates vibration for feedback or alert purposes.

name: Fan Module
description: Cooling module used for temperature regulation in devices.

name: UV Sensor
description: Sensor for measuring ultraviolet light intensity in the environment.

name: RGB LED
description: Multicolor LED used for creating dynamic lighting effects.

name: Hall Effect Sensor
description: Magnetic sensor used for detecting magnetic field strength and polarity.

name: Thermistor
description: Temperature sensor whose resistance varies with temperature.

name: Piezoelectric Sensor
description: Sensor used for detecting vibration or strain in devices.

name: Capacitive Touch Sensor
description: Sensor used for touch detection in user interfaces.

name: PIR Motion Sensor
description: Passive infrared sensor used for motion detection.

name: L298N Motor Driver
description: Module used for controlling DC and stepper motors in robotics.

name: MOSFET Module
description: Control module used for switching and amplifying signals.

name: Electromagnetic Lock
description: Locking module used in security and access control systems.

name: Relay Shield
description: Control module for managing multiple relay switches.

name: XBee Module
description: Wireless communication module used for Zigbee protocol.
